name: Gran Turismo 4: Nike Limited Edition
synopsis: The package contains a copy of [[Gran Turismo 4]], a NIKE T-Shirt as well as NIKE shoes (four different sizes available) and a guide book packed together into an aluminum limited edition case. When playing GT4 while having an EyeToy camera connected as well as wearing the supplied T-Shirt, a special NIKE car will become available in the game.
